last_episode_to_air.name: Olympic Strength Under Pressure
last_episode_to_air.overview: Team Shuster's epic journey toward Olympic qualification reaches its dramatic climax in a head-to-head showdown with a group of talented young curlers.

name: American Rock Stars
overview: Nick Offerman narrates an all-access series following the defending gold medalist men's curling team as they represent the United States at the 2022 Winter Olympics. A group of regular guys with small-town roots relives their memorable gold medal run from 2018, when they went from relative obscurity to worldwide fame. The documentary tells the personal stories of skip John Shuster, the anchor of the squad, and each team member. From their unlikely success in Pyeongchang to the challenge of fending off an upstart team of rivals at the Olympic trials, it's a feel-good story of how a team of self-described rejects tries to overcome challenges and the pressure to reach the pinnacle of their sport one more time.
tagline: The unlikeliest Olympic champions are back.

episodes.name: “Team Reject” Wins Olympic Gold
episodes.overview: After winning gold in 2018, Team Shuster reconvenes on the ice as they plot a course for what they hope is a repeat Olympic journey; the three returnees, plus a newcomer, reflect on their incredible underdog story from South Korea.

episodes.name: Work Begins Again
episodes.overview: With the glory of 2018 gold a distant memory, Olympic preparations crank up and the team faces unexpected hardships on and off the ice; chaos ensues at the World Championships, with a positive COVID test throwing the team into a state of turmoil.

episodes.name: Omaha! Omaha!
episodes.overview: Team Shuster goes to the 2022 U.S. Olympic Trials in Omaha as the curling team to beat; the hunter becomes the hunted as their upstart rivals, Team Dropkin, present a stiff challenge.

episodes.name: Olympic Strength Under Pressure
episodes.overview: Team Shuster's epic journey toward Olympic qualification reaches its dramatic climax in a head-to-head showdown with a group of talented young curlers.
